keyword: double double in n out calories
title: Calories in In-N-Out Double Double
meta_description: Discover double double in n out calories: 670 kcal per burger, plus full macros like protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and tweaks for custom orders.
assumptions: Standard Double Double: two beef patties, two cheese slices, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread, toasted bun. No modifications or extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; In-N-Out values based on official data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: An In-N-Out Double Double packs 670 kcal and 37 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Animal style (extra spread, mustard, pickles, grilled onions)

faqs.q: How many calories in a double double in n out?
faqs.a: 670 calories for the standard Double Double burger.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in an In-N-Out Double Double?
faqs.a: About 37 g of protein per burger.

faqs.q: How much fat and sodium in a Double Double?
faqs.a: 39 g total fat (16 g saturated) and 1440 mg sodium.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in In-N-Out Double Double calories?
faqs.a: Yes, 39 g carbs including 2 g fiber and 10 g sugars, mostly from the bun and spread.

faqs.q: How do customizations affect Double Double calories?
faqs.a: Swapping bun for lettuce cuts ~240 kcal; adding cheese or extras increases by 80â€“190 kcal.
